sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"分开，分离，隔离"之意。
means: isolate ： 侧重指完全分离、隔开，也指人或处于完全孤立的状态。
separate ： 指一般意义上的分开或隔开。
segregate ： 指把一群人或物从整体或主体中分离出来。
insulate ： 指隔开、分离，尤指用某种东西阻挡从里面逃出或从外面进入的东西。作技术用词时，专指用某种绝缘体隔断通路。

word_mean: 分离，离析，隔绝，隔离：使人或物分隔开
细菌学指从临床送检标本中获取的纯株，它可能是原始混合培养的一部分
通过分离或隔离取得的群体(如由纯培养取得的细菌或其他细胞)，或通过地理、生态或社会壁障防止与其他类别个体杂交繁殖以突出其新特征的个体群

sentence.Network_en: A chemist can isolate the oxygen from the hydrogen in water.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个化学家能把水中的氧和氢分解.

sentence.Network_en: Do not isolate yourself from others.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (as a verb): back-formation from isolated

entry.tran: 使孤立;使脱离(朋友、支持者)
entry.def: To isolate a person or organization means to cause them to lose their friends or supporters.

example.ex: This policy could isolate the country from the other permanent members of the United Nations Security Council...
example.tran: 这一政策可能会使该国孤立于联合国安全理事会其他常任理事国之外。

example.ex: Political influence is being used to shape public opinion and isolate critics.
example.tran: 政治影响正被用来左右公众舆论,使批评家们陷于孤立。

entry.def: If you isolate yourself, or if something isolates you, you become physically or socially separated from other people.

example.ex: When he was thinking out a problem Tweed's habit was never to isolate himself in his room...
example.tran: 思考问题的时候,特威德从来没有把自己关在房间里的习惯。

example.ex: His radicalism and refusal to compromise isolated him...
example.tran: 他的激进主义与拒绝妥协使他受到孤立。

entry.def: If you isolate something such as an idea or a problem, you separate it from others that it is connected with, so that you can concentrate on it or consider it on its own.

example.ex: Our anxieties can also be controlled by isolating thoughts, feelings and memories...
example.tran: 我们也可以通过将一些想法、感情与记忆分开考虑以控制焦虑情绪。

example.ex: ...attempts to isolate a single factor as the cause of the decline of Britain...
example.tran: 试图分离出一种因素作为英国衰退的原因

entry.def: To isolate a substance means to obtain it by separating it from other substances using scientific processes.

example.ex: We can use genetic engineering techniques to isolate the gene that is responsible...
example.tran: 我们可以使用基因工程技术把相关基因分离出来。

example.ex: Researchers have isolated a new protein from the seeds of poppies.
example.tran: 研究人员已经从罂粟种子里分离出一种新的蛋白质。

entry.def: To isolate a sick person or animal means to keep them apart from other people or animals, so that their illness does not spread.

example.ex: Patients will be isolated from other people for between three days and one month after treatment...
example.tran: 治疗结束后,病人将与其他人隔离3天到1个月的时间。

example.ex: You don't have to isolate them from the community.
example.tran: 你没必要把他们与社区隔离。

sentences.sentence: "They isolated the political prisoners from the other inmates"
"The chemist managed to isolate the compound"
"The dentist sequesters the tooth he is working on"

means.word_mean: 4. separate (experiences) fromt he emotions relating to them

auth_sentence.content: This will only further isolate the country and its people.
auth_sentence.res_content: This will only further isolate the country and its people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This will only further isolate the country and its people.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+sol单独+ate表形容词→非常单独→荒凉的
sol单独+e→adj.单独的,唯一的 n.脚垫,鞋底

stems_affixes.value_cn: [好]孤独的;偏僻的;单一的,唯一的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sol单独+itary→adj.[好]孤独的;偏僻的;单一的,唯一的
sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
desolate[adj.荒凉的;孤独的 v.使荒芜]+ion表名词→n.荒凉,凄凉
i=in+s=sol单独+land陆地→在[海洋]中间的单独陆地→岛,岛屿
sol单独+e→adj.单独的,唯一的 n.脚垫,鞋底
sol单独+itude状态→单独的状态→孤独
sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
para旁边+sol太阳→太阳旁边→不晒太阳→遮阳伞
solar太阳的+ium地方→n.日光浴室,日晷
de加强+sol单独+ate表形容词→非常单独→荒凉的
in进入+sol太阳+ate使……→进入太阳之中
solar[adj.太阳的,日光的]+ize表动词→v.[摄]使过度曝光,晒 v.曝光

Sentence.sentence: In Japan young women may be rebelling against their mothers' isolated lives of child rearing.
They are more or less isolated from the outside world.
Case studies of children who were isolated from others reveal that they lack a firm self-concept, and their mental and psychological development is severely hindered by lack of language.

means.word_mean: 使隔离, 使孤立, 使脱离

sentences.en: Do not isolate yourself from others.
A chemist can isolate the oxygen from the hydrogen in water.
sentences.cn: 化学家可以把水中的氢和氧分离开来。

jushi.english: Do not isolate yourself from others.
A chemist can isolate the oxygen from the hydrogen in water.
jushi.chinese: 化学家可以把水中的氢和氧分离开来。

jushi.english: The radical group in the ruling party is becoming increasingly isolated.
jushi.chinese: 执政党内的激进派变得愈来愈孤立。
